ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List escalation policies
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List escalation policies
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List all of the existing escalation policies.
Escalation policies define which user should be alerted at which time.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#escalation-policies)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List escalation policies

List all of the existing escalation policies. Escalation policies define which user should be alerted at which time. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#escalation-policies)

Method: Get

OperationID: listEscalationPolicies

EndPoint:

/escalation_policies
